info.name: Powerlytic IoT Monitoring API
info.description: Powerlytic IoT Monitoring Backend API - A comprehensive Express.js + TypeScript API for managing IoT devices, organizations, users, telemetry data, and alerts. Features JWT authentication with role-based access control (CompanyAdmin, OrgAdmin, OrgUser).
